title: How do I write a suggestion about player action? or where
body: I wrote a suggestion and gave a specific example. About trolls in the pre game. Where would I put that. I put it under player moderation and behavior. But riot keeps taking it down. They take it does because they say I should report the guy, but that's not even the reason for the post. What do I do? They have unintelligent people working at riot that do not like when I use common sense to explain things to them.

replies.body: When providing scenarios, be sure not to call out specific players or put an unwanted spotlight on others.  The Player Behavior boards are a great place for discussions on this, but the post-game reporting tool is the best option to submit reports on individual players.  If you have concerns about moderation, please use the [Player Behavior & Moderation boards ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) and review the [Universal Rules.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules)
